service.tut.pori.apilta.alerts.datatypes

Class AndGeoFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.tut.pori.apilta.alerts.datatypes.AndGeoFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    core.tut.pori.dao.filter.AbstractQueryFilter

    public class AndGeoFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements core.tut.pori.dao.filter.AbstractQueryFilter
    Basic filter for searching documents based on coordinate data. The default filter type for this filter is DEFAULT_FILTER_TYPE.
